item.description:
http://ballsquarecafe.com/

 

Hey Inquisitives!    

Here at IM virtual HQ, we were wondering what are the best places for Sunday Brunch?   Where is best for coffee?  Which one had the best food?  Where would you go back because of the atmosphere, the crowd, the music, etc.?  Which venues can handle a large group?  Which are quiet enough for a group conversation?   Which are just to damn good not to check out?

Add your suggestions as a comment to this event, or send me your suggestions by email.  We'll schedule meetups for the most promising contenders to win the Brunch War!
item.name: Brunch Wars: Ball Sq. Cafe
